meanings.definition: Showing a lack of enthusiasm or optimism.
meanings.sent1: The team's downhearted performance disappointed their coach.
meanings.sent2: Her downhearted attitude affected the mood of the group.
meanings.sent3: Despite the party decorations, his downhearted demeanor stood out.
meanings.sent4: The wilted flowers in the vase looked downhearted in the dim light.
meanings.sent5: The downhearted tone of his voice conveyed his lack of hope.
